tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE EmployeePerformance (
    employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    training_duration INT,
    progress_percent DECIMAL(5,2)
)

CREATE TABLE EmployeePerformance (
    employee_id UUID NOT NULL,
    employee_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    training_module VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    completion_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    progress_percent INT NOT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ProgressHistory (
    history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id UUID NOT NULL,
    training_module VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    completion_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    date_completed TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES EmployeePerformance(employee_id)
);

CREATE TABLE employee_training (
    employee_id INT,
    module_id INT,
    training_date DATE,
    completion_status BOOLEAN,
    PRIMARY KEY (employee_id, module_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (employee_id) REFERENCES employee_performance(employee_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (module_id) REFERENCES training_modules(module_id)
);

CREATE TABLE employee_progress (
    progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    employee_id INT,
    module_id INT,
    progress_percentage DECIMAL,
    completed_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE employee_performance (
  employee_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  training_completed BOOLEAN,
  training_score INT
)

CREATE TABLE training_modules (
  module_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  module_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  module_duration INT
)

CREATE TABLE progress_tracking (
  employee_id INT,
  module_id INT,
  progress_percentage FLOAT,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE employee_feedback (
  feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  feedback_text TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE employee_ratings (
  rating_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_id INT,
  rating_value INT
)
